name: sms-publisher
description: SMS Publisher - Personal SMS Sending System

scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public'); if(!fs.existsSync('public/styles')) fs.mkdirSync('public/styles'); if(fs.existsSync('src/frontend/main_app.html')) fs.copyFileSync('src/frontend/main_app.html', 'public/index.html'); console.log('Build completed - static files ready');"

author: xwang
